experts.desc: Our specialists have 25 years of experience
expertArray: Vitamins and minerals are essential micronutrients. They don't provide energy, they are vital for the proper and normal functioning of the body, maintaining good health in general. In today's world, additional sources of vitamins and minerals are not a mere recommendation, but a necessity especially if you conduct an active lifestyle.

In vitamin complexes and dietary supplements, the most important thing is the correct dosage of active ingredients. Therefore, choose only proven products with professionally selected ingredients based on scientific research.

Taking a multivitamin is the easiest way to take care of your health. They contain the optimal dosage of vitamins and minerals that are necessary for a modern person to conduct an active lifestyle and maintain health.

promo.title: Immunal
promo.item_2: Strengthens the body's defenses against viruses and bacteria
promo.item_4: Contains powerful natural immunomodulators beta-glucan and elderberry extract and a complex of vital vitamins and minerals

ingredients.title: High quality ingredients for your immunity needs

ingredientArray1.text: One of the most valuable medicinal plants in the world due to the content of phenolic acids. These compounds are powerful antioxidants that can help reduce damage to the body from oxidative stress by stimulating the immune system.

Promote healthy immune function and reduce oxidative stress. They are effective in the fight against colds and viral diseases, inhibit the growth and reproduction of pathogenic microorganisms, relieve inflammation.

Stimulates the functions of the immune system: helps to reduce the risk of infectious diseases (viral, bacterial and parasitic origin). And as an antioxidant, it stimulates cells to bind oxygen radicals, which can prevent autoimmune diseases.

Histidine is an essential amino acid that is also a precursor to several hormones as well as a precursor to a compound known as histamine. It activates immune responses, increases the rate of maturation of immune cells, increases their activity and significantly increases their lifespan.

ingredientArray2.text: One of the main reasons for the lowering of immunity is excessive stress. B vitamins support the nervous system and take care of the health and beauty of the skin and hair.

Vitamin D directly affects the immune system, increasing its protective functions, in addition, without this substance, it is impossible to assimilate calcium in the body. It is especially important to get adequate amounts of vitamin D during cloudy seasons, as sun exposure is the main source of vitamin D.

Vitamin A takes care of vision by supporting the normal functioning of the retina. Vitamin A also promotes cell growth, playing an important role in the normal functioning of the heart, lungs, kidneys and other organs.
Selenium is an essential element in antioxidant protection. It is this mineral that protects the body from harmful oxidants, prevents cell damage and infections.

advantages.title: GoodLabs Immunal is a proven support for your immunity
advantages.desc: In the modern world, it is very difficult for a person to monitor nutrition and lead a healthy lifestyle in order to maintain strong immunity. But there is a solution. GoodLabs Immunal with beta-glucan is a vitamin and mineral complex with scientifically proven action of components to maintain the strength of the immunity.
advantages.text: β-glucan is a potent inducer of epigenetic and functional reprogramming of cells of innate immunity, a process called "trained immunity", which leads to an increased response to secondary infections.

feedback.text: Vitamins and minerals are essential micronutrients. They don't provide energy, they are vital for the proper and normal functioning of the body, maintaining good health in general. In today's world, additional sources of vitamins and minerals are not a mere recommendation, but a necessity especially if you conduct an active lifestyle.

technical.title: Technical Information
technical.text_1: Take 1 capsule daily with water with or after food.
technical.text_2: Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. A food supplement is not intended to substitute for a healthy diet. Do not use the product in case o individual intolerance to the ingredients.
technical.text_3: Store in the original packaging in a dark dry place. Do not store above 25 °C.

questionArray.ttl: What is the uniqueness of the IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs complex?
questionArray.text: The IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs complex is created considering all the nutritional needs of the immune system of a human living in the modern world. The product naturally stimulates the immune system and serves as the prevention of many diseases.

questionArray.ttl: Is IMMUNAL safe to take without a doctor's prescription?
questionArray.text: A doctor's prescription is optional, but it is worth consulting with a specialist when taking other supplements or medications.

questionArray.ttl: Are there any contraindications for administration?
questionArray.text: A contraindication is individual intolerance to the components.

questionArray.ttl: How to take the complex?
questionArray.text: Take once a day with water or during / after meals.

questionArray.ttl: What is the course of administration?
questionArray.text: The course of administration is determined in accordance with the individual needs of your body.

questionArray.ttl: How to know if “Immune complex” TM GoodLabs is right for me?
questionArray.text: If your goal is to strengthen your immune system, then IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs will be the ideal assistant on the way to it.

questionArray.ttl: Aren`t dosages of the product too large?
questionArray.text: For the regulation of consumed substances, there are norms of physiological needs. They are individual for different countries. However, there are basic consumption levels that all countries are guided by.

questionArray.ttl: Can IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs complex be taken for prophylaxis during illnesses high season?
questionArray.text: Of course, the vitamin complex IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs is designed to constantly support human immunity, including during the high season of colds.

promo.title: Multi Vitamin
promo.item_1: Contains over 20 vital vitamins and minerals
promo.item_2: The optimal amount of active ingredients for daily use
promo.item_3: Fortified with antioxidant vitamins (such as C, A and E)
promo.item_4: Helps maintain high physical and mental activity

ingredients.title: High quality ingredients for your immunity needs

ingredientArray1.text: Vitamin B3 is involved in the synthesis of hormones, and they in turn affect our well-being and vitality. It also stimulates enzymes and gastric juice involved in digestion, which results in the saturation of the body with energy and nutrients.
Along with other B vitamins, vitamin B12 helps convert food into energy. It also helps prevent a type of anemia that can make you weak and tired.

Promotes rapid recovery in case of strength loss, protects against increased fatigability. This element participates in the transmission of nerve impulses and in the contraction and relaxation of muscles, which is important for the cardiovascular system functioning.

Vitamin C is most often used to strengthen immunity, but it also has a positive effect on our well-being and energy levels. It is required for the synthesis of L-Carnitine, which helps the body burn fat for energy.

ingredientArray2.text: Vitamin C helps stimulate the production of white blood cells, known as lymphocytes and phagocytes, which help protect the body from infection.

Vitamin D enhances the anti-pathogens effect of monocytes and macrophages, white blood cells that are an important part of the immune defense, and reduces inflammation, which improves an immune response.

Zinc is essential for the development and communication of immune cells and plays an important role in the inflammatory response. A deficiency in this nutrient leads to an increased risk of infections and diseases, including pneumonia.
B vitamins, including B12 and B6, have anti-inflammatory effect and influence the production of melatonin, which in turn improves the immune response.

ingredientArray3.text: Magnesium helps regulate neurotransmitters that send signals throughout the brain and nervous system. It plays a critical role in brain function and mood, and low levels are associated with an increased risk of depression.

Manganese is essential for healthy brain function and is often used to treat certain nervous disorders. It speeds up the conduction of electrical impulses through the body, which in turn affects the speed of the brain's reaction.
Getting enough vitamin B12 can improve memory and make learning easier. It has also been shown to help improve mood and reduce symptoms of depression and low mood.

Zinc is important for the areas of the brain responsible for concentration and memory. With a lack of zinc, the cerebral cortex begins to malfunction, which can be expressed in hallucinations, epileptic seizures, impaired sense of smell and loss of taste.

ingredientArray4.text: Inositol can help balance important brain chemicals, including those thought to affect mood, such as serotonin and dopamine.

Folic acid, or vitamin B9, is also involved in the synthesis of serotonin. It also regulates the fission and growth of all cells in the body, including nerve cells, which, as we now know, are able to restore.
Vitamin B6 is necessary for the synthesis of gamma-aminobutyric acid, the most important "calming" substance in the central nervous system, as well as serotonin, the "hormone of happiness".

Magnesium is especially important among the microelements for the central nervous system. It regulates the process of conducting a nerve impulse, and therefore, is necessary for adequate sleep and maintaining a stable psycho-emotional state.

ingredientArray5.text: Lack of vitamin D3 affects the body's ability to regulate cyclic rhythms. When the body's clock is not working properly, it is unable to transmit signals to sleep hormones that are involved in falling asleep.
Vitamin E deficiency has been linked to restless legs syndrome, which can greatly affect sleep quality. Vitamin E helps you fall asleep faster and prevents sleep interruption during the night.
B vitamins are essential for the proper functioning of the adrenal glands and thus help prevent the release of adrenaline at night when not needed.
Iron deficiency is also thought to be the main cause of restless legs symptom, which in turn causes insomnia and anxiety disorders that make it difficult to fall asleep.

ingredientArray6.text: Biotin promotes good skin health and is essential for the production of keratin, a protein that helps strengthen nails and hair. It is biotin that is one of the main elements that promotes the growth of healthy and thick hair.
Vitamin C acts as an antioxidant in the body, helping to protect cells from damage caused by free radicals, thereby slowing down aging.

It is responsible for the firmness, elasticity and hydration of the skin and hair. This natural antioxidant, as well as vitamin C, helps the body to prolong youth and has a positive effect on the endocrine profile, which directly affects the condition of our skin.
Vitamin A plays a very important role in the process of skin cell renewal, and also stimulates the functioning of fibroblasts, cells associated with the production of collagen and elastin.

promo.title: Anti–Stress
promo.item_1: Снижает уровень гормона стресса при многозадачности
promo.item_2: Успокаивает нервную систему при воздействии сильных раздражителей
promo.item_5: Благоприятно влияет при умственной и физической усталости

ingredients.title: High quality ingredients for your immunity needs

ingredientArray1.text: Является хорошо изученным и эффективным  адаптогеном. Это свойство родиолы связано с двумя мощными активными ингредиентами травы - розавином и салидрозидом. Эти соединения повышают способность организма справляться со стрессом, с умственной и физической усталостью, а также благоприятно влияет на настроение.

Аминокислота, которая  способствует снижению уровня гормона стресса- кортизола,  который вырабатывается в ответ на стрессовую задачу, предполагающую многозадачность. L-теанин также известный своим когнитивно-усиливающим действием, снижает тревожность, но при этом не вызывает заторможенность.

advantages.title: GoodLabs Anti-Stress – надежная поддержка нервной системы в любой ситуации
advantages.desc: Активная жизнь неизбежно сопровождается стрессом, который разрушительным образом действуют на организм. GoodLabs Anti-Stress  разработан для жизни в современном мире, чтобы каждый мог сохранять внутреннее равновесие организма, снизить уровень гормона стресса, защитить нервные клетки и уберечься от эмоционального выгорания.
advantages.text: В исследовании, которое проводилось с помощью магнитоэнцефалографии (МЭГ) в состоянии покоя,  изучался антистрессовый эффект L-теанина. Оно показало, что Альфа-осцилляторная активность в состоянии покоя была значительно выше в задних сенсорах после применения  L-теанина  по сравнению с плацебо через два часа после введения дозы, что свидетельствует о снижении тревоги. Результаты настоящего исследования дополнительно подтверждают антистрессовый эффект L-теанина.

feedback.text: Основа здоровья человека – достаточное количество витаминов и минералов в организме. Продукты GoodLabs созданы, чтобы укрепить эту основу и помочь вам жить полноценной жизнью

faq.title: Good to know
faq.desc: If you didn't find the answer to your question, feel free to write to us

questionArray.ttl: Почему именно комплекс "Стрессоустойчивость" ТМ GoodLabs?
questionArray.text: Данный комплекс в своем составе содержит только хорошо изученные компоненты, действие который подтвержденны исследованиями.

questionArray.ttl: Безопасен ли прием без назначения врача?
questionArray.text: Назначение врача необязательно, но при приеме других добавок или лекарств стоит проконсультироваться со специалистом.

questionArray.ttl: Есть ли противопоказания к приему?
questionArray.text: Противопоказанием является индивидуальная непереносимость компонентов. В период беременности и лактации только проконсультировавшись со специалистом.

questionArray.ttl: Как принимать комплекс?
questionArray.text: Принимать один раз в день, запивая водой или во время / после еды.

questionArray.ttl: Какой курс приема?
questionArray.text: Курс приема определяется в соответствии с индивидуальными потребностями вашего организма.

questionArray.ttl: Вызывает ли комплекс сонливость?
questionArray.text: Комплекс не вызывает сонливости и заторможенности.

promo.title: Vision
promo.item_2: Снимает усталость глаз после работы за компьютером или других нагрузках на зрение
promo.item_5: Помогает справится с синдромом сухого глаза

ingredients.title: High quality ingredients for your immunity needs

ingredientArray1.text: Стимулирует синтез гликозаминогликана, за счет чего капилляры сетчатки становятся более прочными. Она также улучшает микроциркуляцию и борется с окислительным стрессом, который также является фактором ухудшения зрения.
Ягоды маки помогают справится с симптомом сухого глаза. Они восстанавливают способность слезной железы образовывать жидкость, тем самым возвращая ощущение комфорта.

Обладает способностью улучшать остроту зрения и чувствительность сетчатки к свету. Он устраняет основную причину возрастной дегенерации желтого пятна и улучшает светочувствительность, что очень важно с возрастом.

advantages.title: GoodLabs Vision – надежная поддержка вашего зрения
advantages.desc: В современном мире зрение человека постоянно сталкивается с серьезными испытаниями: экраны гаджетов и мониторов, увеличение окислительного стресса,  несбалансированное питание и другие. GoodLabs Vision способен поддержать здоровье глаз и обеспечить их комфорт, благодаря действенным природным  компонентам с доказанной эффективностью.
advantages.ttl: Экстракт черники для надежной защиты вашего зрения
advantages.text: В результате двойного слепого клинического исследования, в котором экстракт черники сравнивался с плацебо, пациенты, которые принимали экстракт ягод, испытали значительное улучшение в соответствии с тестом Ширмера, который является широко используемым показателем для измерения выработки слез и влажности глаз. Также в группе черники биологический антиоксидантный потенциал плазмы увеличился через 4 недели. У людей, принимавших плацебо, не было значительных изменений.

feedback.text: Основа здоровья человека – достаточное количество витаминов и минералов в организме. Продукты GoodLabs созданы, чтобы укрепить эту основу и помочь вам жить полноценной жизнью

technical.title: Technical Information
technical.text_1: Take 1 capsule daily with water with or after food.
technical.text_2: Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. A food supplement is not intended to substitute for a healthy diet. Do not use the product in case o individual intolerance to the ingredients.
technical.text_3: Store in the original packaging in a dark dry place. Do not store above 25 °C.

faq.title: Good to know

questionArray.ttl: Почему именно комплекс "Стрессоустойчивость" ТМ GoodLabs?
questionArray.text: Данный комплекс в своем составе содержит только хорошо изученные компоненты, действие который подтвержденны исследованиями.

questionArray.ttl: Безопасен ли прием без назначения врача?
questionArray.text: Назначение врача необязательно, но при приеме других добавок или лекарств стоит проконсультироваться со специалистом.

questionArray.ttl: Есть ли противопоказания к приему?
questionArray.text: Противопоказанием является индивидуальная непереносимость компонентов. В период беременности и лактации только проконсультировавшись со специалистом.

questionArray.ttl: Как принимать комплекс?
questionArray.text: Принимать один раз в день, запивая водой или во время / после еды.

questionArray.ttl: Какой курс приема?
questionArray.text: Курс приема определяется в соответствии с индивидуальными потребностями вашего организма.

questionArray.ttl: Вызывает ли комплекс сонливость?
questionArray.text: Комплекс не вызывает сонливости и заторможенности.

article_1.title_main: Vitamin bomb: why it is important to take multivitamin complexes
article_1.desc: The clinical diagnosis of “vitamin deficiency” is not very common these days, but people continue to massively buy vitamin complexes. Why is this happening? Does our body really need external support? And what is the principle of work of multivitamin complexes? Let's examine all the issues in more detail.
desc_1: In the United States, from 40 to 50% of men and women at the age of 50 and older regularly use multivitamin / mineral supplements, resulting in more than $ 11 billion in annual sales of these supplements. Of course, this demand generates even more supply and forms a whole market that is engaged in the release of new and new products.

There is an opinion that multivitamin complexes are poorly absorbed by the body and do not bring any benefit to it. Is it true? The expression is true only for those products that contain vitamins and nutrients in too high concentrations, unable to be absorbed by cells.

In addition, scientists focus on some features of individual vitamins: some of them are fat-soluble, others are water-soluble. Some are destroyed by direct sunlight, while others require a “partner”, who will enhance their effect, for the activation. All these points are fundamentally important to take into account in the preparation of the vitamin complex formula.
article_1.ttl_2: The ABC of Health: How to Recognize Body Signals?
desc_2: The human body is a well-coordinated system, an integral mechanism, all elements of which depend on each other. Many vital processes require a certain level of energy, which is obtained mainly from food. Small portions of energy give us water and drinks, exercises, good healthy sleep.
But people do not always manage to independently satisfy all the needs of their bodies for vitamins and microelements. How to recognize the signals of the body and understand what it lacks?
article_1.ttl_3: Signs of a lack of vitamins in the human body
article_1.list_item_1_1: brittle hair and nails, dry skin;
article_1.list_item_4_1: the level of sugar in the blood rises;
article_1.list_item_4_2: the condition of the skin, hair, nails worsens.
article_1.text_1: Laboratory testing is still considered the most effective way to detect vitamin and mineral deficiencies.
desc_3: There are a lot of sources of vitality in the world. So, people have access to tasty and varied food, clean drinking water, healthy deep sleep from 7 hours and moderate physical activity. All these factors increase vitality.
In case of vitamin deficiency, you need to pay close attention to food products:
list_1: vitamin A: liver, cod-liver oil;
vitamin B1: pine nuts, oatmeal, peas, soy;
vitamin B2: chicken eggs, nuts, liver;
vitamin B3: beans, champignons and other mushrooms, peas;
vitamin B6: pine nuts, beans, pomegranate, bell peppers;
vitamin B12: milk, liver, meat, fish, eggs;
vitamin C: canker-rose, kiwi, bell pepper, citrus;
vitamin D3: liver, fish, butter, eggs;
iron: liver, eggs, pistachios;
iodine: seafood, iodized salt, cod;
calcium: milk, pistachios, peas;
magnesium: seeds and nuts;
zinc: liver, beans, oysters, peas.
article_1.text_2: Why there are so many vitamin supplements, if all the substances are in food?!
article_1.ttl_5: Modern methods of elimination of vitamin deficiencies
desc_4: Unfortunately, with an external abundance of resources, a person does not always have the opportunity to meet the internal needs of his body. Microbiological analysis of pure water often turns out to be not so “pure”. Farm vegetables and fruits can accumulate nitrates and heavy iron from the soil. Poultry, livestock meat, and fish often retain contamination or are subjected to artificial interference from the outside.

Multivitamin complexes are the only way to get the missing nutrients, and they must be included in the diet. Taking multivitamins is absolutely safe, but only if the complex contains the necessary vitamins and minerals in sufficient and necessary quantities - no more and no less but the right amount that you need to maintain health.
GoodLabs Multivitamin is an example of a complex balanced in terms of dosage and composition.
desc_5: GoodLabs Multivitamin is a highly effective German complex of vitamins and minerals in optimal concentrations for the body.
How GoodLabs Multivitamin helps your body:
article_1.list_text_1: Vitamins C and D3 and zinc maintain the integrity of the natural anti-inflammatory barrier, thereby avoiding infection during the period of seasonal weakening of the body's defense and general loss of strength.
article_1.list_text_2: The Golden Four for bones - vitamins B and D, as well as natural minerals calcium and magnesium - play an important role in the body, helping the normal formation of the skeletal system, as well as muscle function and blood circulation.
article_1.list_text_3: The product contains histidine, molybdenum, B vitamins, which enrich the metabolic system with essential nutrients, support the functioning of the gastrointestinal tract and liver, and remove toxins from the body.
article_1.list_text_4: B vitamins and magnesium relieve fatigue and depression, promote good sleep and support the nervous system, heart muscles and normal blood circulation.
article_1.text_last: Don't compromise on quality; choose only the best for your health. Take care of a well-structured daily routine, adequate rest, active time in the fresh air, a balanced diet, and GoodLabs Multivitamin will help keep your body's vitality at a high level every day.

article_2.title_main: The question of quantity: why is it important to observe the correct dosage when taking vitamin complexes
article_2.desc: There is enough where there is not too much. This proverb fully reflects the main rule of a healthy and happy life - a life in balance. It is important to adhere to the balance rule when taking multivitamin complexes. How to understand the needs of your body and how to determine the dosage of each individual vitamin will be described in more detail in the article.
desc_1: The term “megavitaminization” appeared relatively recently, but its relevance is increasing from year to year. About 20-30% of citizens of developed countries take vitamin supplements every day, but does this benefit their health? How safe are vitamin supplements and why are food manufacturers now additionally vitaminize even bread and milk? Let`s answer all questions in order.

Indeed, the production of vitamins is a large industry with a multi-million-dollar turnover. But it arose as a response to the poor quality of human food. Increasingly, farmed vegetables and fruits become the nucleus for the accumulation of nitrates from the soil. Less and less often meat or fish provide us with useful protein, and not an excess of heavy iron.

The quality of drinking water also leaves much to be desired, therefore, even with a balanced diet, the problem of individual vitamin deficiencies is acute for many people. So, almost every second has a lack of vitamin D3 hormone, which can be compensated by specialized supplements. Or, if the condition of the skin, hair and nails deteriorates, most often the tests confirm the fact of a lack of biotin.

Undoubtedly, the phenomenon of megavitaminization exists, but it arose as a response to the problem of vitamin deficiency. Again, it is also important to adhere to the principle of balancing in resolving this issue.
article_2.text_1: The daily requirement for vitamins is a variable unit. It depends on many external factors:
list_1: what you ate throughout the day;
what you drank;
how and how much you rested;
how well you slept;
how many hours you spent outdoors;
whether you did physical activity.
desc_2: Nutrition, sports, stress, sleep - all of them force our body to spend a certain amount of energy, to start clear biochemical processes. Vitamins and microelements are special substances that the body needs to function properly. In fact, these compounds are the building blocks of cells and entire organ systems that directly affect the quality of human life.

Vitamins and microelements have no nutritional value, but they perform important functions: they regulate metabolic processes, catalyze biochemical reactions, and help in the assimilation of many mineral components. But their overabundance has a polarizing effect.
article_2.text_3: An overabundance of vitamin complexes leads to hypervitaminosis. Why is this condition dangerous? It is characterized by the accumulation of a certain vitamin in the human body, which leads to unpredictable consequences. Let's find out by what signs we can recognize hypervitaminosis of individual elements:
list_2: with prolonged use of vitamin A in high doses (more than 50,000 units), drowsiness, increased intraocular pressure, headache, nausea, vomiting, visual impairment (macular swelling on the retina), photophobia, hemorrhages are observed.

uncontrolled intake of vitamin D (more than 1000 IU per 1 kg of body weight) leads to hypercalcemia and hypercalciuria. An overdose of vitamin D disrupts the transport of potassium and magnesium, which is accompanied by a deterioration in the contractile activity of the heart, the development of foci of micronecrosis and the appearance of arrhythmias.
large doses of vitamin E have a toxic effect on neutrophils, platelets, intestinal epithelium, liver and kidney cells; inhibit the activity of vitamin K-dependent carboxylase.
the use of B6 at a dose of 50 mg or more per day causes a violation of the metabolism of proteins, carbohydrates and lipids, degenerative changes in the central nervous system.
article_2.text_4: And this is not a complete list of all the pitfalls of uncontrolled intake of vitamin supplements.
article_2.ttl_4: When the intake of vitamins is necessary
article_2.text_5: Most doctors, dieticians, and certified nutritionists identify 4 situations when vitamin intake is vital for a patient:
list_3: In the treatment of hypo- and avitaminosis (after the appropriate diagnosis, they are prescribed by the attending physician).
In the treatment of various diseases (usually recommended and / or prescribed by the attending physician).
To increase the adaptive capacity of the organism in doses exceeding the daily requirement by 2-3 times (we are talking about monotherapy medicines that are prescribed by the attending physician).
In order to prevent hypovitaminosis (especially in the winter and spring seasons; vitamins are “prescribed” and selected independently or after consultation with a pharmacist).
article_2.text_6: In such situations, the intake of vitamin complexes is fully justified and recommended clinically.
desc_3: Multivitamin complexes are the only way to get the missing nutrients and they must be included in the diet. Taking multivitamins is absolutely safe, but only if the complex contains the necessary vitamins and minerals in sufficient and necessary quantities - no more and no less but the right amount that you need to maintain health.

GoodLabs Multivitamin is an example of a complex, balanced in terms of dosage and composition. It is a safe, natural product of premium German quality, developed to meet all the needs of the body. Preventive dosages have an optimal healing effect without harming a person.

GoodLabs Multivitamin Vitamin and Mineral Complex was developed by professionals based on cutting-edge scientific research. Perfect German formulas activate the body's defenses, vitamins A, C and E play the role of a natural antioxidant, and B vitamins and calcium strengthen the musculoskeletal system. Magnesium and rhodiola rosea extract are responsible for the stability of the nervous system, while probiotics improve the functioning of the digestive tract.
desc_last: For the safe intake of the vitamin complex, it is important, under the supervision of the attending physician, to pass all tests for vitamin deficiencies and undergo a thorough diagnostic procedure. Then take only those supplements that follow the principles of a preventive dosage that is safe.
Remember that more – is not always better. Be attentive to your well-being and be healthy!

article_3.title_main: Harmony of health: how vitamins affect the body
article_3.desc: Even the root “vita” in the word “vitamins” is translated from ancient Greek as life. A healthy, active, full life without limits. Everyone dreams of this when buying another jar of a multivitamin complex. But are all supplements in the diet so safe and what effect does each individual vitamin have on a person's well-being? Let's talk about this in more detail in the article.
desc_1: Vitamins and microelements are special substances that the body needs to function properly. In fact, these compounds are the building blocks of cells and entire organ systems that directly affect the quality of human life.

Vitamins and microelements have no nutritional value, but they perform important functions: they regulate metabolic processes, catalyze biochemical reactions, and help in the assimilation of many mineral components. But their overabundance has a polarizing effect.
Modern science knows about 20 different vitamins, but the list continues to grow. By origin, 2 main groups of vitamins are distinguished:
list_1: synthetic (artificially produced in laboratories);
and natural (which the body receives from natural food).
article_3.text_1: In addition, vitamins are categorized by chemical ability into:
list_2: water-soluble (C and B vitamins) are not stored by the body, and in case of excess they are simply excreted from it in the urine;
fat-soluble (A, D, E, K) accumulate in the body, especially in adipose tissue and liver.
article_3.text_2: It is important to consider in more detail how each individual group affects our body in a complex and what consequences deficiencies or overdose of these vitamins can lead to.
desc_2: Most consumers consider B vitamins to be completely safe, as they are water-soluble compounds. But this is not entirely true. Even a small overdose of vitamin B6 (biotin) leads to damage to neurosensory connections and individual nerve endings. Therefore, be especially careful about complexes for the growth of hair and nails, since it is in such medicines the amount of B6 is often overstated.

Vitamin B3 (niacin), in turn, helps to regulate the level of bad cholesterol and has a beneficial effect on blood microcirculation, but with its excess in the body, polar processes occur: the level of cholesterol rises, and the blood becomes viscous.

Vitamin B12 prevents the development of anemia and normalizes the metabolism of amino acids. But, according to scientific studies in 2012, with an overdose of vitamin B12, acne appears, a general deterioration in human well-being.
desc_3: Vitamin C is another water-soluble vitamin that is taken in huge dosages during colds. But does this provide real benefits to our body? No. This is because even with a high dosage, vitamin C is not retained in the cells, but is excreted from there in the urine. With the right dose, vitamin C neutralizes charged free radicals by accepting their free electron. This is a true “molecular martyr”, taking the blow to protect the cellular neighborhood.

But an overdose of vitamin C from an antioxidant war hero turns him into a dangerous free radical, which produces oxidative processes in the body. That is why leading scientists insist on regular, but dosed intake of vitamin C.
desc_4: In the press there is an epic name for vitamin E as “the vitamin of youth”. Is it really true? Vitamin E really significantly accelerates the processes of soft tissue regeneration, reduces the intensity of the wrinkles appearance. But its uncontrolled intake may have even lethal consequences.
This is supported by data from two large scientific experiments (a study published in the New England Journal of Medicine in 1994 and a 2005 study published in the Annals of Internal Medicine).
desc_5: Vitamin A is known for helping to maintain good vision, healthy skin, teeth, skeletal and soft tissues, and mucous membranes. People who do not get enough vitamin A are more likely to suffer from infectious diseases and ophthalmic problems.

But a high dose of the vitamin causes nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, loss of appetite, fatigue, headaches, dizziness, blurred vision, poor muscle coordination, itching and flaky skin, bone pain, hair loss, irregular menstruation in women, osteoporosis, and temporary or permanent liver damage. High doses of vitamin A also increase the risk of lung cancer in smokers. The problem with it is that, unlike other vitamins, excess amounts are not washed out in the urine, but rather accumulated in the liver.
desc_6: One of the most interesting members of this list, since it is not just a vitamin, but a vitamin-hormone. It is clear that low levels of vitamin D reduce the body's defense when fighting infection. In other words, vitamin D is essential for the formation of strong immunity.

But at the same time, an excess of vitamin D increases the risk of heart pathologies and diseases of the cardiovascular system in general. Vitamin D is critically important when taking calcium, since it is this vitamin that allows the element to be fully absorbed. However, this does not mean that vitamin D alone has any positive effect on strengthening the musculoskeletal system.
desc_7: Vitamin deficiency can be compared to a lack of basic building blocks on site. A house built without important blocks will settle down over time and cease to exist due to poor-quality construction. Likewise, our body experiences a vital need for a particular component of health.

With a deficiency of vitamin A, a person's vision deteriorates, with a deficiency of thiamine, heart failure occurs. With a deficiency of pantothenic acid, you feel weak and fatigued, and with a deficiency of biotin, you notice how bad your hair, nails and skin are. GoodLabs Multivitamin Vitamin and Mineral Complex contains an optimal concentration of base ingredients for your health and wellness.

The power is within you. It is only important to know the depth of your potential, to reveal the reserve of raging energy and apply it in life. GoodLabs Multivitamin Balanced Complex was created specifically for this purpose.

GoodLabs Multivitamin is a revolutionary development by leading professionals based on cutting edge research from scientists. Optimal safe prophylactic dosages, high bioavailability of each component of the formula, good absorption and synergistic action of all elements. These are the main advantages of German quality without compromise. GoodLabs Multivitamin is a proven health support group.
article_3.desc_last: It is important to remember that the body's need for vitamins must first of all be provided by natural vitamins from food. And in case of a shortage of food resources - by taking premium quality vitamin complexes.

article_4.title_main: Natural shield: the role of beta-glucan for Immunity
article_4.desc: Modern realities show us that it is necessary to be afraid of colds not only in the off-season. It is important to take care of your immunity all year round, increasing the body's defense. Beta-glucans are the basis for well-being and disease-freeness. How does this element work and why is it valuable for the human body? Let's consider this in more detail in the article.
desc_1: Beta-glucans are natural immunomodulatory agents that are most widely used in medical and pharmacological practice around the world. In fact, beta-glucans are polysaccharides made up of glucose molecules. The discovery of beta-glucans is undoubtedly a real breakthrough in the scientific world, because these elements solve the problem of the instability of the immune system in the fight against viruses and bacteria.

Beta-glucans are found in the cell walls of bacteria, fungi, yeast, algae, lichens, and plants such as oats and barley. Since the beta-glucan molecule itself is quite large in size, when it enters the intestine, it does not undergo fragmentary fermentation. They are captured by the cells of the intestinal mucosa and are actively transferred to the submucosal layer, where they activate macrophages, and through them – lymphocytes that are responsible for protecting the endothelium, that is, the local immunity.
desc_2: Once in the stomach, large molecules of beta-glucans are not over-etched, but move further along the digestive system. They are captured by the cells of the intestinal mucosa and transferred by them to the submucosal layer, where they activate macrophages, and through them - lymphocytes responsible for protecting the endothelium, that is, for local immunity. Due to the repopulation mechanism, activated lymphocytes from the intestinal mucosa are disseminated into the mucous membranes of various organs, thus ensuring their protection against infections.

Scientists recently noted another amazing ability of beta-glucan to literally “absorb” bad cholesterol from blood plasma. Thus, the element has a positive effect on the entire cardiovascular system, reduces the risk of heart attacks and strokes, cleans the walls of blood vessels.
article_4.ttl_3: Benefits of beta-glucans for the body
article_4.text_1: The most important property of beta-glucans is the ability to accelerate metabolism, eliminate slags and toxins, and improve digestion. When it enters the cecum and colon, beta-glucan is gradually turning into polysaccharides, which serve as a nutrient medium for the microflora of the large intestine. Also, fiber speeds up the movement of food through the digestive tract, improving the process of digestion. As a result, the functional state of the gastrointestinal tract improves and the intestinal microflora normalizes.
article_4.text_2: Also, beta-glucan can work to regulate the amount of glucose in the blood, which is why diabetics take it on an ongoing basis. With regard to local and general immunity, we have already found out the principle of action of this element, which has been proven to increase the protective abilities of the body.
desc_3: Beta-glucan is a completely natural substance with unique biological properties. Beta-glucan stimulates macrophages and antibody production. It is a powerful and safe immune booster. It stimulates immune responses, increasing the rate of maturation of immune cells, changing their activity and significantly increasing their lifespan.

This is why beta-glucan has become the base ingredient in GoodLabs' Immunal complex formula. This substance also has a beneficial effect on reducing the frequency of symptoms of influenza and SARS. Beta-glucans activate both local immunity, protecting the body from invasions of antigens, and systemic immunity, which leads to the destruction of foreign genetic material that has already penetrated into the body.
desc_last: Every day with food, you get a lot of vitamins and nutrients, but some of the elements are still in short supply. When developing the Immunal complex, it was important to determine a clear dosage of each element of the formula to maintain the ideal balance within the body.
The result of the research was the perfect composition of the complex, where each component complements each other. Beta-glucan is leading the fight for strong immunity and wellness.

componentArray.title: Vitamin A
componentArray.text: It is a fat-soluble vitamin that is important for normal sense of vision and support for the immune and reproductive systems.

componentArray.title: Vitamin B1
componentArray.text: It helps to transform food into essential energy, plays a crucial role in energy metabolism and therefore in the growth, development and functioning of cells.

componentArray.title: Vitamin B2
componentArray.text: It helps the body to split fats and carbohydrates and also provides skin renewal.

componentArray.title: Vitamin B3
componentArray.text: It promotes the functioning of the digestive, nervous systems and skin, plays an important role in the transmission of cellular signals, DNA creation, and also acts as an antioxidant.

componentArray.title: Vitamin B6
componentArray.text: It performs a wide range of functions in the body and is extremely multipurpose, participates in the development of the baby brain during pregnancy, as well as in immune function.

componentArray.title: Vitamin B12
componentArray.text: It helps to maintain the health of nerve and blood cells, and promotes the production of DNA, the genetic material of all cells.

componentArray.title: Vitamin C
componentArray.text: It acts as an antioxidant to help protect cells from damage caused by free radicals.

componentArray.title: Vitamin D3
componentArray.text: It helps the body to take up calcium, promotes muscle tone, increases immunity, is necessary for the functioning of the thyroid gland and normal blood clotting.

componentArray.title: Vitamin E
componentArray.text: This vitamin is popular first of all for its antioxidant properties, cell protection and free radical neutralization.

componentArray.title: Biotin
componentArray.text: It promotes good skin health and helps to regulate bad cholesterol and blood sugar levels.

componentArray.title: Folic acid
componentArray.text: An important substance for the production of DNA and other genetic material, as well as for the proper functioning of the immune system, heart and blood vessels, and the synthesis of amino acids.

componentArray.title: Panthothenic acid
componentArray.text: It is also known as vitamin B5, which is important for boosting metabolism, as it is involved in the release of energy from essential nutrients as well as other vitamins.

componentArray.title: Magnesium
componentArray.text: It is important substance for many processes in the body, including the regulation of muscle and nerve function, blood sugar level and blood pressure.

componentArray.title: Ferrum
componentArray.text: An essential element for metabolic processes - participates in the destruction and utilization of toxins, cholesterol metabolism, the transforming of calories into energy. It also helps the body's immune system to deal with aggressors.

componentArray.title: Zinc
componentArray.text: A nutrient, that people need for their immune systems to function well, helps to control bacteria and viruses.

componentArray.title: Manganese
componentArray.text: This essential micronutrient element helps the body to take up amino acids, carbohydrates and fats.

componentArray.title: Copper
componentArray.text: A mineral that is required for many important functions, including the production of energy, connective tissues, and blood vessels.

componentArray.title: Iodine
componentArray.text: The body needs iodine to produce thyroid hormones. These hormones control the body's metabolism and many other important functions.

componentArray.title: Molybdenum
componentArray.text: The body uses molybdenum to process proteins and genetic material. It also helps to split drugs and toxic substances that enter the body.

componentArray.title: Selenium
componentArray.text: Its main ability is to protect the body from harmful oxidants, preventing damage and infection. Current researches shows that selenium is an essential element in antioxidant defense.

componentArray.title: Inositol
componentArray.text: Inositol is often referred to as vitamin B8, but it is a type of sugar that affects insulin response and several hormones associated with mood and cognition.
